markdownContent:
Having been distracted by your call with Prof Moira, you turn back to see that the middle-aged professor has disappeared, and Lorraine Okada is now busy with someone else.

But perhaps because the professor was asking her about the Hawaiian painting, Lorraine has projected it once again on the screen. While you’re waiting to speak to her, take a look at some of the painting’s details—you can get right up close to it by using the zoom function.

Open your notebook and note down anything else you may now notice in the painting. And try to remember some of the questions that the professor was asking Lorraine about it.
